definitions.definition: a part of a piece of furniture such as a desk, used for keeping things in. It is like a box in shape and has a handle on the front for pulling it out.

examples.text: in the **top/middle/bottom drawer** of the desk
the kitchen drawer *(= the one in the kitchen)*
He pushed the drawer shut with a bang.
I put the letters in the drawer.
She pulled open the second drawer down to find the money had gone.
He took the gun from the drawer.
What do you think you are doing, rummaging through my drawers?
a desk with two deep drawers either side

definitions.definition: a person who produces a drawing or design

examples.text: He is an expert drawer and painter.

definitions.definition: a person who writes a cheque (= a printed form that you can write on and sign as a way of paying for something instead of using money)

examples.text: a cheque bearing the signature of the drawer
